author: Patrick Buchanan
title: Kissinger Still Pushing the Myth of a Happy New World Order
description: Even with the reality of the virus all around us, old peddlers of internationalism ignore the signs of states hunkering down. The post Kissinger Still Pushing the Myth of a Happy New World Order appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Even with the reality of the virus all around us, old peddlers of internationalism ignore the signs of states hunkering down.Among the works that first brought Henry Kissinger to academic acclaim was A World Restored, his 1950s book about how the greatest dip… [+5128 chars]
